title: Theory-Neutral Instructional Design Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Basic Science Education and General Understanding of Instructional Design
context.additional_context: Acquiring flexible instructional design methods applicable in science education for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain a theory-neutral design framework by analyzing common dimensions across various instructional theories.
Learners can operationalize science teaching strategies into three core dimensions (goals, methods, and assessment) tailored to science education contexts.
Learners can develop science lesson designs applicable to real classroom environments through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
